acrobat.name: Acrobat
acrobat.ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are or become drunk or poisoned tonight, you die.
acrobat.otherNightReminder: The acrobat chooses a player. If they were poisoned or drunk at dusk, or are poisoned or drunk, the Arcobat dies.
acrobat.flavor: Ladies and gentlemen, hold fast to your hats, for I shall defy the very laws of gravity and dance upon the air, a marvel of agility and daring, all for your delight and wonder!

alchemist.name: Alchemist
alchemist.ability: You have a Minion ability. When using this, the Storyteller may prompt you to choose differently.
alchemist.firstNightReminder: Show the Alchemist a not-in-play Minion token
alchemist.flavor: Visit the interior of the Earth. By rectification thou shalt find the hidden stone. Above the gold, lieth the red. Kether in Malkuth.

shrouds.title: You Have This Ability

jinx.reason: If the Alchemist has the Boffin ability, the Alchemist does not learn what ability the Demon has.
An Alchemist-Marionette has no Marionette ability & the Marionette is in play.
An Alchemist-Mastermind has no Mastermind ability & the Mastermind is not-in-play.
If the Alchemist has the Organ Grinder ability, the Organ Grinder is in play. If both are sober, both are drunk.
An Alchemist-Spy has no Spy ability & a Spy is in play. After each execution, a living Alchemist-Spy may publicly guess a living player as the Spy. If correct, the Demon must choose the Spy tonight.
The Alchemist-Summoner does not get bluffs, and chooses which Demon but not which player. If they die before this happens, evil wins. [No Demon]

An Alchemist-Widow has no Widow ability & a Widow is in play. After each execution, a living Alchemist-Widow may publicly guess a living player as the Widow. If correct, the Demon must choose the Widow tonight.

An Alchemist-Wraith has no Wraith ability & a Wraith is in play. After each execution, a living Alchemist-Wraith may publicly guess a living player as the Wraith. If correct, the Demon must choose the Wraith tonight.

alhadikhia.name: Al-Hadikhia
alhadikhia.ability: Each night*, you may choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.
alhadikhia.otherNightReminder: The Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 players. Announce the first player, wake them to nod yes to live or shake head no to die, kill or resurrect accordingly, then put to sleep and announce the next player. If all 3 are alive after this, all 3 die.

jinx.reason: If the Al-Hadikhia dies by execution, and the Mastermind is alive, the Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 good players tonight: if all 3 choose to live, evil wins. Otherwise, good wins.
If the Princess nominated & executed a player on their 1st day, no one dies to the Al-Hadikhia tonight.

alsaahir.name: Alsaahir
alsaahir.ability: Each day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.
alsaahir.flavor: I am here because of you, and you are here because of me.

amaniti.name: Amaniti
amaniti.ability: Your neighbours falsely register to good players' abilities.

amnesiac.name: Amnesiac
amnesiac.ability: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.
amnesiac.firstNightReminder: Decide the Amnesiac's entire ability. If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.
amnesiac.otherNightReminder: If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.
amnesiac.flavor: Wait. What. Who? Oh, ok. Wait. What?

angel.name: Angel
angel.ability: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.
angel.flavor: Let those who are without sin dare to raise their hand to my chosen, for I shall strike such fools down with the fury and righteousness of a thousand storms.

apothecary.name: Apothecary
apothecary.ability: Once per game, publicly change one game rule, if the Storyteller agrees.

apprentice.name: Apprentice
apprentice.ability: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good) or a Minion ability (if evil).
apprentice.firstNightReminder: Show the Apprentice the 'You are' card, then a Townsfolk or Minion token. In the Grimoire, replace the Apprentice token with that character token, and put the Apprentice's 'Is the Apprentice' reminder by that character token.
apprentice.flavor: For years have I traveled, studying the ways of The Craft. Which craft, you ask? Simply that of the simple folk. Nothing to worry about. Not yet.

shrouds.title: You Have This Ability

artist.name: Artist
artist.ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.
artist.flavor: Mon Dieu! C'est lumineux! My work, she is... how you say... Magnifique! Dieu est révélé! Oui.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.
assassin.otherNightReminder: If the Assassin has not yet used their ability: The Assassin either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player dies.

astrologer.name: Astrologer
astrologer.ability: Each day, ask the Storyteller to tell you 1 piece of false information.

atheist.name: Atheist
atheist.ability: The Storyteller can break the game rules, and if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]
atheist.flavor: Let us disperse with unnecessary conjecture and silly paranoia. There is a perfectly rational explanation for everything. Yes, a teacup may indeed be orbiting the planet, too small to see, but I shall drink my tea from the very real china in my very real hands.

auditor.name: Auditor
auditor.ability: You start knowing how many players have abilities affecting set up. [No default Outsiders]
auditor.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of players that have abilities affecting set up.

ballerina.name: Ballerina
ballerina.ability: You start knowing if more townsfolk are (1) odd or (2) even steps from you clockwise. Or you learn that (3) it's equal.
ballerina.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (1,2,3) if more townsfolk are (1) odd, (2) even, or (3) even steps from the Ballerina in the clockwise direction.

balloonist.name: Balloonist
balloonist.ability: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]
balloonist.firstNightReminder: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.
balloonist.otherNightReminder: Choose a character type that does not yet have a Seen reminder next to a character of that type. Point to a player whose character is of that type, if there are any. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.
balloonist.flavor: More heat! Higher! Higher! Più alto! Ahhh... it is so beautiful from up here, don't you agree? Can you see the children fishing by the river, under the willow? Can you see the  glint of the sun on the circus tent-poles? What's this? An old man, alone, passed out in the vineyard? Less heat! Lower! Lower! Vai più in basso!

banshee.name: Banshee
banshee.ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.
banshee.flavor: Gorm do shúile, dearg do ghruaig, ní bheidh sé i bhfad, is a mbeidh tú san uaigh.

barber.name: Barber
barber.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.
barber.otherNightReminder: If the Barber died today: Wake the Demon. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then Barber token. The Demon either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to 2 players. If they chose players: Swap the character tokens. Wake each player. Show 'You are', then their new character token.
barber.flavor: Did you know that barbery and surgery were once the same profession? No? Well, now you do.

shrouds.title: The Barber Died. Choose Two Players.

barista.name: Barista
barista.ability: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.
barista.firstNightReminder: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).
barista.otherNightReminder: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).
barista.flavor: A cup of coffee with no cream, Monsieur? I’m terribly sorry, but we’re fresh out of cream — how about with no milk?

shrouds.title: You Will Get True Info Tonight.
You Will Act Twice Tonight.

baron.name: Baron
baron.ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]
baron.flavor: This town has gone to the dogs, what? Cheap foreign labor... that's the ticket. Stuff them in the mine, I say. A bit of hard work never hurt anyone, and a clip'o'the ears to any brigand who says otherwise. It's all about the bottom line, what?

barrowfog.name: Barrow-Fog
barrowfog.ability: Each night*, choose an alive player: they die. Players killed by the Barrow-Fog register as alive during the day.
barrowfog.otherNightReminder: Barrow-Fog chooses a player, mark them as dead with a reminder token, but not on their token.

beekeeper.name: Beekeeper
beekeeper.ability: One evil player registers as good and as a Townsfolk or Outsider. If you publicly guess who it is (once per game), your team wins.

beggar.name: Beggar
beggar.ability: You must use a vote token to vote. If a dead player gives you theirs, you learn their alignment. You are sober and healthy.
beggar.flavor: Alms for the poor, good Sir? Spare a coin, Madam? Thank you. God bless! You're a right kind soul and no mistake! I'll have some swanky nosh tonight, I will!

bishop.name: Bishop
bishop.ability: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposing player must be nominated each day.
bishop.flavor: In nomine Patris, et Filii, et Spiritus Sancti… Nos mos Dei. Deus vult de nobis.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.ability: You start knowing how many outsiders are in play. All outsiders are drunk, even if you are dead. [+1 Outsider]
blacksmith.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of outsiders in play.

bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
bodyguard.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character (not the Bodyguard): they are not affected in any way by evil abilities.
bodyguard.firstNightReminder: Show the Bodyguard the 'use your ability?' card. If the Bodyguard choses a character mark that player as 'safe'.
bodyguard.otherNightReminder: Show the Bodyguard the 'use your ability?' card. If the Bodyguard choses a character mark that player as 'safe'.

boffin.name: Boffin
boffin.ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.
boffin.firstNightReminder: Wake the Boffin and the Demon. Show them the the token of the good character that the Demon has the ability of.
boffin.flavor: Stellar hydrogen, vast, inert; carbon, oxygen, neon gases, all ruined. Molecular chaos, entropy, yields new cosmic phenomena, rebirth from atomic chaos, dense matter collapsing. All in a teeny little bottle.

shrouds.title: You Have Been Given This Ability

jinx.reason: If the Demon has the Cult Leader ability, they can’t turn good due to this ability.
The Demon cannot have the Drunk ability.
If the Demon has the Goon ability, they can’t turn good due to this ability.
The Demon cannot have the Heretic ability.
The Demon cannot have the Ogre ability.
The Demon cannot have the Politician ability.
If there is a spare token, the Boffin can give the Demon the Village Idiot ability.

bonecollector.name: Bone Collector
bonecollector.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.
bonecollector.otherNightReminder: The Bone Collector either shakes their head no or points at any dead player. If they pointed at any dead player, put the Bone Collector's 'Has Ability' reminder by the chosen player's character token. (They may need to be woken tonight to use it.)
bonecollector.flavor: I collect many things. Hair. Teeth. Clothes. Fragments of poems. The dreams of lost lovers. My secret arts are not for you to know but my fee is a mere pittance. Bring me the blood of a noblewoman who died of heartbreak under a full moon, and you shall have your answers.

shrouds.title: You Will Wake Once More Tonight.

bonvivant.name: Bon Vivant
bonvivant.ability: Your alive neighbouring players are drunk (not including Travelers).

boomdandy.name: Boomdandy
boomdandy.ability: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. After a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most players pointing at them, dies.

bootlegger.name: Bootlegger
bootlegger.ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
bootlegger.flavor: I've got the latest shipment from home, a brew I'd like to call 'Barrowfog'. Wanna try?

bountyhunter.name: Bounty Hunter
bountyhunter.ability: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
bountyhunter.firstNightReminder: Point to {Known=1 evil player}. Wake {Evil=the townsfolk who is evil} and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign.
bountyhunter.otherNightReminder: If {Known=the known evil player} has died, point to another evil player.
bountyhunter.flavor: Alone, I walk these streets, paved with the sick stench of corruption. Its thickness worms its way into my nostrils, unbidden, burning with revulsion. And anticipation. The illness of this wretched place grows each night. And I... I am the cure.

jinx.reason: If the Kazali turns the Bounty Hunter into a Minion, an evil Townsfolk is not created.
If the Philosopher gains the Bounty Hunter ability, a Townsfolk might turn evil.

buddhist.name: Buddhist
buddhist.ability: For the first 2 minutes of each day, veteran players may not talk.
buddhist.flavor: You throw thorns. Falling in my silence, they become flowers.

bully.name: Bully
bully.ability: Any players who vote differently to you might die.
bully.firstNightReminder: The Casanova picks a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.
bully.otherNightReminder: The Casanova picks a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.

bureaucrat.name: Bureaucrat
bureaucrat.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.
bureaucrat.firstNightReminder: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
bureaucrat.otherNightReminder: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
bureaucrat.flavor: Sign here please. And here. And here. Aaaaaaaaand here. This should all be sorted and tallied by the end of the day, assuming everyone's signatures are legible. We haven't had a mix-up in the paperwork for ages. Yesterday noon, if memory serves...

butcher.name: Butcher
butcher.ability: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.
butcher.flavor: It tastes like chicken. More please.

butler.name: Butler
butler.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.
butler.firstNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
butler.otherNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
butler.flavor:
Yes, sir...
				No, sir...
				Certainly, sir.

jinx.reason: If the Organ Grinder is causing eyes closed voting, the Butler may raise their hand to vote but their vote is only counted if their master voted too.

cacklejack.name: Cacklejack
cacklejack.ability: Each day, choose a player: a different player changes character tonight.
cacklejack.otherNightReminder: A player the Cacklejack didn't choose today changes character.
cacklejack.flavor: Wire α To wire β. LigHt oN. BuZZer off. GAzOinks! Arms STra1ght. FingER 2 nose. hOooLd stiLL. BoiNgo-banGo! Ha-ha-ha!

cannibal.name: Cannibal
cannibal.ability: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.
cannibal.otherNightReminder: If someone good was executed today, the cannibal has their ability. If the executee was evil they are poisoned. Cannibal goes where the executee was in the night order.
cannibal.flavor: I don’t like clowns. They taste funny.

jinx.reason: If the Cannibal gains the Butler ability, the Cannibal learns this.
If the Juggler guesses on their first day and dies by execution, tonight the living Cannibal learns how many guesses the Juggler got correct.
If the Cannibal nominated, executed, & killed the Princess today, the Demon doesn’t kill tonight.
If the Cannibal gains the Zealot ability, the Cannibal learns this.

casanova.name: Casanova
casanova.ability: Each night, choose an alive player (not yourself). If they're an ally & executed tomorrow your team loses.
casanova.firstNightReminder: The Casanova picks a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.
casanova.otherNightReminder: The Casanova picks a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.

cerenovus.name: Cerenovus
cerenovus.ability: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are "mad" they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.
cerenovus.firstNightReminder: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.
cerenovus.otherNightReminder: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.
cerenovus.flavor: Reality is merely an opinion. Specifically, my opinion.

shrouds.title: The Cerenovus Has Made You Mad As:

jinx.reason: The Cerenovus may choose to make a player mad that they are the Goblin.

chambermaid.name: Chambermaid
chambermaid.ability: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.
chambermaid.firstNightReminder: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
chambermaid.otherNightReminder: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
chambermaid.flavor: I aint seen nothin' untoward, Milady. Begging your pardon, but if I did see somethin', it certainly weren't the master o' the house sneaking into the professor's laboratory 'round eleven o'clock and mixing up fancy potions, just like you said, Miss.

charlatan.name: Charlatan
charlatan.ability: At night, you become the alignment of the 1st player to be executed this game.

chef.name: Chef
chef.ability: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.
chef.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of pairs of neighbouring evil players.
chef.flavor: This evening's reservations seem odd. Never before has Mrs Mayweather kept company with that scamp from Hudson Lane. Yet, tonight, they have a table for two. Strange.

choirboy.name: Choirboy
choirboy.ability: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+the King]
choirboy.otherNightReminder: If the King was killed by the Demon, wake the Choirboy and point to the Demon player.
choirboy.flavor: I saw it, I did. I was in the pews, tidying the hymn books, when a dreadful tune started from the pipe organ. The organist had a long cloak, and long fingers on the keys. And a hat that looked… just like… yours.

clockmaker.name: Clockmaker
clockmaker.ability: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
clockmaker.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
clockmaker.flavor: Do not disturb me. The tick must continue, for the circle is a symbol of life and contains all things - all answers - in its divine machinery. I must work.

coachman.name: Coachman
coachman.ability: Each day, choose a 1 word topic on which the Storyteller tells you 1 fact. If an alive neighbour is evil, you get false info.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.ability: You have the ability of an in-play Minion. If no others exist, you start by choosing a Minion: gain their ability.
copycat.firstNightReminder: Show the Copycat an in-play minion token. If there are none, prompt the Copycat to choose a minion ability.

courtier.name: Courtier
courtier.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.
courtier.firstNightReminder: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.
courtier.otherNightReminder: Reduce the remaining number of days the marked player is poisoned. If the Courtier has not yet used their ability: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.
courtier.flavor: I am more afraid of an army of one hundred sheep led by a lion than an army of one hundred lions led by a sheep.

creepingterror.name: Creeping Terror
creepingterror.ability: Each night*, mark up to 3 players or kill all marked players. Marked players learn that they are marked.
creepingterror.otherNightReminder: Creeping Terror chooses up to 3 players to mark or chooses to kill marked players.

cultleader.name: Cult Leader
cultleader.ability: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbor. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.
cultleader.firstNightReminder: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.
cultleader.otherNightReminder: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.
cultleader.flavor: Thinking themselves wise, they became fools.

damsel.name: Damsel
damsel.ability: All Minions know a Damsel is in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.
damsel.firstNightReminder: Wake all the Minions, show them the 'This character selected you' card and the Damsel token.
damsel.otherNightReminder: If selected by the Huntsman, wake the Damsel, show 'You are' card and a not-in-play Townsfolk token.

shrouds.title: There Is A Damsel.

daughterofnox.name: Daughter of Nox
daughterofnox.ability: Good's info is reversed. The 1st time each player names you: lose your ability (if they are good), regain it (if they are evil).

deusexfiasco.name: Deus ex Fiasco
deusexfiasco.ability: At least once per game, the Storyteller will make a mistake, correct it, and publicly admit to it.
deusexfiasco.flavor: It’s not a bug, it’s a feature. It’s not an error, it’s a tweak. It’s not broken, it’s quirky.

deviant.name: Deviant
deviant.ability: If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.

devilsadvocate.name: Devil's Advocate
devilsadvocate.ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.
devilsadvocate.firstNightReminder: The Devil's Advocate points to a living player. That player survives execution tomorrow.
devilsadvocate.otherNightReminder: The Devil's Advocate points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.
devilsadvocate.flavor: My client, should the objection be overruled, pleads innocent by virtue of the prosecution's non-observance of statute 27.B - incorrect or misleading conjugation of a verb. The fact that nine of the jury died last night is simply prima facie, which is, as Wills vs Thule set precedent for, further reason to acquit.

diplomat.name: Diplomat
diplomat.ability: You start knowing which players are minions. If a minion you know is executed, your team loses, even if dead.
diplomat.firstNightReminder: Show the Diplomat which players are minions.

djinn.name: Djinn
djinn.ability: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.
djinn.flavor:
نحن لسنا هنا.
				انت لست حقيقي.
				كل شيء هو وهم.
				أسئلتك هي جبل نار في يوم صافٍ.

dolomite.name: Dolomite
dolomite.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they turn evil & learn who you are. Once per game, you lose this ability. [No Minions]
dolomite.otherNightReminder: The Dolomite chooses a player, change their alignment to Evil and inform them. Decide if the Dolomite loses their ability.

doomsayer.name: Doomsayer
doomsayer.ability: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.
doomsayer.flavor: And on the Seventh Day, there shall be a great flood and a pestilence upon the People of the Village of the Ravens! The dead shall rise and the living shall repent! O Woe! O Unholy day! Only by great sacrifice shall they prevail! So sayeth the Sages of Nostros and so sayeth I.

dowager.name: Dowager
dowager.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon sees the Grimoire.
dowager.firstNightReminder: If the Dowager died show the demon the Grimoire.
dowager.otherNightReminder: If the Dowager died show the demon the Grimoire.

dreamer.name: Dreamer
dreamer.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.
dreamer.firstNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.
dreamer.otherNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.
dreamer.flavor: I remember the Clockmaker. The sky was red and it was raining fractal triangles. There was a smell of violets and a bubbling sound. A woman with glowing eyes and a scraggly beard was hissing at the sky. Then, I awoke.

druid.name: Druid
druid.ability: Each day, you may publicly choose a player. If either of you die tonight, an alive minion dies instead, if possible.

drunk.name: Drunk
drunk.ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.
drunk.flavor: I’m only a *hic* social drinker, my dear. Admittedly, I am a heavy *burp* socializer.

duchess.name: Duchess
duchess.ability: Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you. At night*, each visitor learns how many visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.
duchess.otherNightReminder: If three people visited you today wake each one at a time and tell them how many of thes who visited you are evil. One person gets false information.
duchess.flavor: We shall entertain between the hours of 6 and 7 precisely. Tea at 6:15. Scones at 6:45. Do not be late. Formal wear applies, as always.

empath.name: Empath
empath.ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.
empath.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbours of the Empath.
empath.otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbours of the Empath.
empath.flavor: My skin prickles. Something is not right here. I can feel it.

engineer.name: Engineer
engineer.ability: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.
engineer.firstNightReminder: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character tokens.
engineer.otherNightReminder: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character tokens.
engineer.flavor: If it bends, great. If it breaks, well, it probably needed fixing anyway.

eviltwin.name: Evil Twin
eviltwin.ability: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.
eviltwin.firstNightReminder: Wake the Evil Twin and their twin. Confirm that they have acknowledged each other. Point to the Evil Twin. Show their Evil Twin token to the twin player. Point to the twin. Show their character token to the Evil Twin player.
eviltwin.flavor: I'm not Sara! I'm Clara! SHE is Sara! Sara is the evil one! Not me!

shrouds.title:
You Two Are Twins.
Your Characters Are:

exorcist.name: Exorcist
exorcist.ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.
exorcist.otherNightReminder: The Exorcist points to a player, different from the previous night. If that player is the Demon: Wake the Demon. Show the Exorcist token. Point to the Exorcist. The Demon does not act tonight.
exorcist.flavor: We cast you out, every unclean spirit, every satanic power, every onslaught of the infernal adversary, every legion, every diabolical group and sect, in the name and by the power of Our Lord Jesus Christ. We command you, begone and fly far from the Church of God, from the souls made by God in His image and redeemed by the precious blood of the divine Lamb.

shrouds.title: You've been Exorcized by:

familiar.name: Familiar
familiar.ability: Each night*, you wake with the Demon and choose a player: they die. If you die, the demon loses its ability.
familiar.otherNightReminder: Wake the familiar and Demon up at the same time. The familiar points as a player, mark them as 'dead'.

fanggu.name: Fang Gu
fanggu.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]
fanggu.otherNightReminder: The Fang Gu points to a player. That player dies. Or, if that player was an Outsider and there are no other Fang Gu in play: The Fang Gu dies instead of the chosen player. The chosen player is now an evil Fang Gu. Wake the new Fang Gu. Show the 'You are' card, then the Fang Gu token. Show the 'You are' card, then the thumb-down 'evil' hand sign.
fanggu.flavor: Your walls and your weapons are but smoke in dreams.

fanzazz.name: Fanzazz
fanzazz.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die & you become their alignment. If you die, your team loses. If only 2 players live, your team wins.
fanzazz.otherNightReminder: The Fanzazz chooses a player, they die. Inform the Fanzazz if they changed alignment.

farmer.name: Farmer
farmer.ability: When you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.
farmer.otherNightReminder: If a Farmer died tonight, choose another good player and make them the Farmer. Wake this player, show them the 'You are' card and the Farmer character token.
farmer.flavor: Even the high and mighty need food on the table. Without us, the city starves.

fearmonger.name: Fearmonger
fearmonger.ability: Each night, choose a player: if you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.
fearmonger.firstNightReminder: The Fearmonger points to a player. Place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.
fearmonger.otherNightReminder: The Fearmonger points to a player. If different from the previous night, place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.
fearmonger.flavor: Beware of gazing long into the Abyss, lest the Abyss also gaze into you.

ferryman.name: Ferryman
ferryman.ability: On the final day, all dead players regain their vote token.
ferryman.flavor: When righteous dreams come, they have the weight of truth.

fibbin.name: Fibbin
fibbin.ability: Once per game, 1 good player might get incorrect information.

fiddler.name: Fiddler
fiddler.ability: Once per game, the Demon secretly chooses an opposing player: all players choose which of these 2 players win.
fiddler.flavor: I'll wager mi lyef ye cannae best me in a fiddle contest, ye boss-eyed snook! We'll go out on the lash, get the pub jammers an' have a right craic. I'll be layin' ma boots into ya come mornin' ye rumbly muppet.

fisherman.name: Fisherman
fisherman.ability: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help your team win.
fisherman.flavor: This was my favourite part of the river... see how the sunlight makes a rainbow from the monastery to the market? This was the best place for big fish. And the older I get, the bigger they were.

flowergirl.name: Flowergirl
flowergirl.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.
flowergirl.otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether the Demon voted today. Place the 'Demon not voted' marker (remove 'Demon voted', if any).
flowergirl.flavor: Yesterday's violets have withered and died, but today my poppies bloom.

shrouds.title: Did You Vote Today?

fool.name: Fool
fool.ability: The 1st time you die, you don't.
fool.flavor: ...and the King said 'What?! I've never even owned a pair of rubber pantaloons, let alone a custard cannon!' Ho-ho! Jolly day!

fortuneteller.name: Fortune Teller
fortuneteller.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.
fortuneteller.firstNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether one of those players is the Demon.
fortuneteller.otherNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Show the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether one of those players is the Demon.
fortuneteller.flavor: I sense great evil in your soul! But... that could just be your perfume. I am allergic to Elderberry.

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.ability: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.
gambler.otherNightReminder: The Gambler points to a player, and a character on their sheet. If incorrect, the Gambler dies.
gambler.flavor: Heads, I win. Tails, you lose.

gangster.name: Gangster
gangster.ability: Once per day, you may choose to kill an alive neighbor, if your other alive neighbor agrees.
gangster.flavor: I like your shoes. It would be such a shame if you had a little accident, and they got ruined. Now that you mention it, I like your cufflinks too.

gardener.name: Gardener
gardener.ability: The Storyteller assigns 1 or more players' characters.
gardener.flavor: Oh now, this won't do. We've got the monkshood mixed in with the wolfsbane and the hemlock is smothering the hellebore! Oh dear me, we'd better start over. Fetch my shears.

general.name: General
general.ability: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.
general.firstNightReminder: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.
general.otherNightReminder: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.
general.flavor: I don’t have time for quotes.

genius.name: Genius
genius.ability: Each night, choose a good character: you have that ability until you choose again. You are drunk every other night.
genius.firstNightReminder: The Genius picks a player, they have their ability.
genius.otherNightReminder: If the genius was drunk from their ability the previous night, make them sober, otherwise mark them with the 'drunk' token, The Genius picks a player, they have their ability.

gnome.name: Gnome
gnome.ability: All players start knowing a player of your alignment. You may choose to kill anyone who nominates them.
gnome.firstNightReminder: When the Gnome enters play, decide on a player to be the Gnome's friend. Declare that this player is the same alignment as the Gnome.
gnome.flavor: Four the score or seven beers, no shows are goes for me and my. A prank to crack the cranks and planks o' the floor foundation length, so incontravertabubbilly mini. The large essays down streams of joyce, no greater than is scene, not inherdt, Ha-urrumph.o.

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.ability: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.
goblin.flavor: You don’t want to insult the goblins. You really, really don’t. On a completely different note… can I have another piece of cake?

godfather.name: Godfather
godfather.ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]
godfather.firstNightReminder: Show each of the Outsider tokens in play.
godfather.otherNightReminder: If an Outsider died today: The Godfather points to a player. That player dies.
godfather.flavor: Normally, it's just business. But when you insult my daughter, you insult me. And when you insult me, you insult my family. You really should be more careful - it would be a shame if you had an unfortunate accident.

goldenchild.name: Golden Child
goldenchild.ability: The 1st player to nominate you, turns evil that night. You cannot nominate yourself.
goldenchild.otherNightReminder: If a player nominated the Golden Child for the first time, change their alignment to evil.

golem.name: Golem
golem.ability: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.
golem.flavor: Golem help? Golem smash! Golem help.

goon.name: Goon
goon.ability: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.
goon.flavor: Yes boss. I explained fings real good to dat geezer. He don't want me explain it again. Nah boss, I don't need no doctor - it's only a knife wound. Be right come mornin'

gorgon.name: Gorgon
gorgon.ability: Each night, choose a player: if they leave their seat tomorrow, they die. Lose this ability when 3 or fewer players live.
gorgon.firstNightReminder: The Gorgon chooses a player, mark them with gorgon_chosen.
gorgon.otherNightReminder: The Gorgon chooses a player, mark them with gorgon_chosen.

gossip.name: Gossip
gossip.ability: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
gossip.otherNightReminder: If the Gossip's public statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.
gossip.flavor: Blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah. Blah.

governess.name: Governess
governess.ability: You start knowing one character type of the closest non-Townsfolk (not including Travellers).
governess.firstNightReminder: Show the Governess one character type of the closest non-Townsfolk (not including Travellers).

grandmother.name: Grandmother
grandmother.ability: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.
grandmother.firstNightReminder: Show the marked character token. Point to the marked player.
grandmother.otherNightReminder: If the Grandmother's grandchild was killed by the Demon tonight: The Grandmother dies.
grandmother.flavor: Take a jacket if you go outside, dearie. And your thermos. And your scarf. I have a weak heart, you know. Whatever would I do if you caught cold...or worse?

gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
gunslinger.ability: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.
gunslinger.flavor: It's time someone took matters into their own hands. That someone... is me.

hangman.name: Hangman
hangman.ability: Once per game, choose a player. Going clockwise, good players that do not publicly state their character in 3 seconds, die.

harlot.name: Harlot
harlot.ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.
harlot.otherNightReminder: The Harlot points at any player. Then, put the Harlot to sleep. Wake the chosen player, show them the 'This character selected you' token, then the Harlot token. That player either nods their head yes or shakes their head no. If they nodded their head yes, wake the Harlot and show them the chosen player's character token. Then, you may decide that both players die.
harlot.flavor: Enchanté, Sailor. You look like you need someone to really listen to your troubles. I'm a good listener. Very, very good.

shrouds.title:
The Harlot Chose You.
Accept the Invitation?

harpy.name: Harpy
harpy.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or one or both might die.
harpy.firstNightReminder: Wake the Harpy. The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the "Mad" reminder and the second player with the "target" reminder. Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the player marked "Mad". Show the "This Character Selected You" info screen with the Harpy token, then point to the player marked "2nd". Put the player marked "Mad" to sleep.
harpy.otherNightReminder: Wake the Harpy. The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the "Mad" reminder and the second player with the "target" reminder. Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the player marked "Mad". Show the "This Character Selected You" info screen with the Harpy token, then point to the player marked "2nd". Put the player marked "Mad" to sleep.
harpy.flavor: So fair a day I never did see, nor so fowl a presence hanging over me.

shrouds.title: The Harpy Has Made You "Mad" At This Player

hatter.name: Hatter
hatter.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.
hatter.firstNightReminder: During that night, wake the Minions and Demon. Show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character. If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Remove the "Tea Party Tonight" reminder. Change each player to the character they chose.
hatter.otherNightReminder: During that night, wake the Minions and Demon. Show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character. If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Remove the "Tea Party Tonight" reminder. Change each player to the character they chose.
hatter.flavor: One Hat. Too Hat. Three Hat. Tea Hat. Fore Hat. Thrive Hat. Six Hat. Sticks Hat.

shrouds.title:
The Hatter Died.
Choose New, Unique Characters.

hellslibrarian.name: Hell's Librarian
hellslibrarian.ability: Something bad might happen to whoever talks when the Storyteller has asked for silence.
hellslibrarian.flavor: Shhhhhh. Please be quiet. It is best not to disturb the Librarian. I've heard it has a temper.

heretic.name: Heretic
heretic.ability: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.
heretic.flavor: After the hail has smashed the roof and splintered the glass of the Cathedral windows, it melts again into the earth, like a dying lamb in the desert sun. Such is the parable of the madman.

jinx.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

hermit.name: Hermit
hermit.ability: You have all Outsider abilities. [-0 or -1 Outsider]
hermit.flavor: In the lost and forgotten places of the earth, the soul’s light beckons.

highpriestess.name: High Priestess
highpriestess.ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.
highpriestess.firstNightReminder: Wake the High Priestess. Point to a player.
highpriestess.otherNightReminder: Wake the High Priestess. Point to a player.
highpriestess.flavor: There is life behind the personality that uses personalities as masks. There are times when life puts off the mask and deep answers to deep.

houndskeeper.name: Houndskeeper
houndskeeper.ability: Each night, you learn how many steps to the nearest living player targeted by an evil ability tonight.
houndskeeper.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of steps the Houndskeeper is from their nearest living player targeted by an evil ability tonight. 0 if no one was targetted.
houndskeeper.otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of steps the Houndskeeper is from their nearest living player targeted by an evil ability tonight. 0 if no one was targetted.

huntsman.name: Huntsman
huntsman.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]
huntsman.firstNightReminder: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.
huntsman.otherNightReminder: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.
huntsman.flavor: My cabin is warm and sturdy. My axe by the door, my boots drying by the fire, and elk stew a-simmering… Hark! A scream echoes through the valley! The rain and the mud and the cold, cold wind mask the scent of the wolves, but I know the path and my pace is steady. I am coming.

hustler.name: Hustler
hustler.ability: Each night*, learn the character that nominated you today. If you are 'mad' about being the Hustler, you receive false info.
hustler.otherNightReminder: Show the Hustler the character token of who they nominated today. If they were 'mad' about being the Hustler, they receive false info.

hwisp.name: Hwisp
hwisp.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If nominated by a Townsfolk, you die. 2nd Townsfolk to nominate in a day's, team loses.
hwisp.otherNightReminder: The Hwisp chooses a player, they die.

imp.name: Imp
imp.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
imp.otherNightReminder: The Imp points to a player. That player dies. If the Imp chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive minion with a spare Imp token. Show the 'You are' card, then the Imp token.
imp.flavor: We must keep our wits sharp and our sword sharper. Evil walks among us, and will stop at nothing to destroy us good, simple folk, bringing our fine town to ruin. Trust no-one. But, if you must trust someone, trust me.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.ability: You poison and gain the ability of the 1st in-play character that you are mad about being each day until the next dawn.

innkeeper.name: Innkeeper
innkeeper.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.
innkeeper.otherNightReminder: The previously protected and drunk players lose those markers. The Innkeeper points to two players. Those players are protected. One is drunk.
innkeeper.flavor: Come inside, fair traveller, and rest your weary bones. Drink and be merry, for the legions of the Dark One shall not harass thee tonight.

insomniac.name: Insomniac
insomniac.ability: Each night*, learn a character that died tonight.
insomniac.otherNightReminder: Show the Insomniac the character token of a player that died tonight.

investigator.name: Investigator
investigator.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.
investigator.firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Minion in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
investigator.flavor: It is a fine night for a stroll, wouldn't you say, Mister Morozov? Or should I say... BARON Morozov?

jnak.name: J'nak
jnak.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. 1 good player knows you are 1 of 2 players. If executed while a minion lives, your team wins.
jnak.firstNightReminder: Choose a player to know the J'nak, mark them with 'knows' and another who is their red herring. Wake the 'knows' player and show them both the J'nak and the red herring.
jnak.otherNightReminder: The J'nak chooses a player, they die.

judge.name: Judge
judge.ability: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.
judge.flavor: I find the defendant guilty of the crimes of murder, fraud, arson, larceny, impersonating an officer of the law, practicing medicine without a license, slander, regicide, and littering.

juggler.name: Juggler
juggler.ability: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.
juggler.otherNightReminder: If today was the Juggler's first day: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of 'Correct' markers. Remove markers.
juggler.flavor: For my next trick, as per request, I will need a flower, a bag of beans, a toy snake, a paintbrush, and a motorized gasoline-powered hedge trimming device. I warn you, this trick may be my last. Oh dear.

kazali.name: Kazali
kazali.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are which Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]
kazali.firstNightReminder: Wake the Kazali and allow them to pick two players and their new minion roles
kazali.otherNightReminder: Wake the Kazali and allow them to pick one player, they die
kazali.flavor: Gon(z)a7les6. Take cau8tun. The mech4an4ion is iNvert10d. E99ors insy6tum. Reco{7}fig.

king.name: King
king.ability: Each night, if the dead equal or outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows you are the King.
king.firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon, show them the 'This character selected you' card, show the King token and point to the King player.
king.otherNightReminder: If the number of dead players is greater than or equal to the number of living players, show the King a character token of a living player.
king.flavor:
↑Betwixt the unknown strains of mortal strife→
                And morbid night, sweet↓ with mystery and woe
                ←Lies unfettered joys of fate’s long and colored life
                Who’s garden blooms with each painted Face to Show.

shrouds.title: Long Live The King.
This Role Is In Play.

klaun.name: Klaun
klaun.ability: Each night, choose up to 3 players. They are told that they are mad in some way, but are not.
klaun.firstNightReminder: The Klaun points to 3 players, mark those players as 'mad' then wake them and inform them they are mad of some character.
klaun.otherNightReminder: The Klaun points to 3 players, mark those players as 'mad' then wake them and inform them they are mad of some character.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

knight.name: Knight
knight.ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.
knight.firstNightReminder: Wake the Knight. Point to the two players marked "Know"
knight.flavor: When a man lies, he murders some part of the world.

lecadeau.name: Le Cadeau
lecadeau.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Townsfolk to nominate you becomes an evil Le Cadeau & you die tonight.
lecadeau.otherNightReminder: If a townsfolk nominated the Le Cadeau for the first time they become an evil Le Cadeau, and the previous dies. The Le Cadeau chooses a player, they die.

legion.name: Legion
legion.ability: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]
legion.otherNightReminder: Choose a player, that player dies.
legion.flavor: We are the chill wind on a winter’s day. We are the shadow in the moonless night. We are the poison in your tea and the whisper in your ear. We are everywhere.

shrouds.title: We Are Legion!

jinx.reason: If Legion is created, all evil players become Legion. If Legion is in play, the Engineer starts knowing this but has no ability.
If Legion is created, all evil players become Legion. If Legion is in play, the Hatter has no ability.
If Legion died by execution today, Legion keeps their ability, but the Minstrel might learn they are Legion.
The Politician might register as evil to Legion.
If the Preacher chooses Legion, Legion keeps their ability, but the Preacher might learn they are Legion.
If Legion is summoned, all evil players become Legion.
The Zealot might register as evil to Legion.

leper.name: Leper
leper.ability: If the demon kills you, they are drunk.

leviathan.name: Leviathan
leviathan.ability: If more than 1 good player is executed, evil wins. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.
leviathan.firstNightReminder: Place the Leviathan 'Day 1' marker. Announce 'The Leviathan is in play; this is Day 1.'
leviathan.otherNightReminder: Change the Leviathan Day reminder for the next day. Announce 'The Leviathan is in play', and the current day.
leviathan.flavor: To the last, I grapple with thee. From Hell’s heart, I stab at thee. For hate’s sake, I spit my last breath at thee.

jinx.reason: Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Banshee dies & gains their ability.
If the Leviathan nominates and executes the Exorcist-chosen player, good wins.
Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Farmer uses their ability but does not die.
If the Leviathan is in play and the Grandchild dies by execution, evil wins.
The Leviathan cannot enter play after day 5.
If the Leviathan nominates and executes an Innkeeper-protected player, good wins.
If the Leviathan is in play, and at least 1 player is dead, the King learns an alive character each night.
If the Leviathan and the Mayor are alive on day 5 & no execution occurs, good wins.
If the Leviathan nominates and executes the Monk-protected player, good wins.
The Leviathan cannot enter play after day 5.
Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive player (different to previous nights): a chosen Ravenkeeper uses their ability but does not die.
Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Sage uses their ability but does not die.
If the Leviathan nominates and executes the Soldier, good wins.

librarian.name: Librarian
librarian.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)
librarian.firstNightReminder: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
librarian.flavor: Certainly madam, under normal circumstances, you may borrow the Codex Malificarium from the library vaults. However, you do not seem to be a member.

lilmonsta.name: Lil' Monsta
lilmonsta.ability: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta & "is the Demon". Each night*, a player might die. [+1 Minion]
lilmonsta.firstNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.
lilmonsta.otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta. Choose a player, that player dies.
lilmonsta.flavor:
Step 1: Be cute.
				Step 2: World domination.
				Step 3: Bweakfast.

shrouds.title:
Choose The Next Babysitter.
Vote By Pointing.
shrouds.epilog: You can pick a good player. I mean, you can also launch an ICBM horizontally. But why?

shrouds.title:
You Are Babysitting Lil' Monsta.
You Are The Demon.
shrouds.epilog: Don't squee at the cute little goober

jinx.reason: If the Hatter dies & the Demon chooses Lil' Monsta, they also choose a Minion to become.
If the Magician is alive, the Storyteller chooses which Minion babysits Lil' Monsta.
If Lil' Monsta & the Poppy Grower are alive, Minions wake one by one, until one of them chooses to take the Lil' Monsta token.
If the Psychopath is babysitting Lil' Monsta, they die when executed.
If Lil' Monsta dies with 5 or more players alive, the Scarlet Woman babysits Lil' Monsta for the rest of the game.
If the Vizier is babysitting Lil' Monsta, they die when executed.

liontamer.name: Lion Tamer
liontamer.ability: If either of your alive neighbours died by execution today, all players are safe from the Demon tonight.
liontamer.otherNightReminder: If either of the Lion Tamer's alive neighbours died by execution today, all players are safe from the Demon tonight.

lleech.name: Lleech
lleech.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing a player: they are poisoned. You die if & only if they are dead."
lleech.firstNightReminder: The Lleech points to a player. Place the Poisoned reminder token.
lleech.otherNightReminder: The Lleech points to a player. That player dies.
lleech.flavor: Tasty, tasty, tasty, tasty, tasty, tasty, tasty, tasty brai- I mean pie! Yes. Tasty pie. That’s what I meant to say.

jinx.reason: If the Mastermind is alive and the Lleech host dies by execution, the Lleech lives but loses their ability.
If the Slayer slays the Lleech host, the host dies.

lordoftyphon.name: Lord of Typhon
lordoftyphon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outsiders]
lordoftyphon.firstNightReminder: wake the appropriate number of players directly clockwise and counter-clockwise from the Lord of Typhon. Show each of these players a unique Minion token, and tell them that they are evil.
lordoftyphon.otherNightReminder: The Lord of Typhon points to a player. That player dies.
lordoftyphon.flavor: In the shadowed and forgotten corners of the cosmos, where the stars whisper secrets to the void, lies a truth so profound that the merest glimpse of it unravels the sanity of mortal minds.

lunatic.name: Lunatic
lunatic.ability: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.
lunatic.firstNightReminder: If 7 or more players: Show the Lunatic a number of arbitrary 'Minions', players equal to the number of Minions in play. Show 3 character tokens of arbitrary good characters. If the token received by the Lunatic is a Demon that would wake tonight: Allow the Lunatic to do the Demon actions. Place their 'attack' markers. Wake the Demon. Show the Demon's real character token. Show them the Lunatic player. If the Lunatic attacked players: Show the real demon each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.
lunatic.otherNightReminder: Allow the Lunatic to do the actions of the Demon. Place their 'attack' markers. If the Lunatic selected players: Wake the Demon. Show the 'attack' marker, then point to each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.
lunatic.flavor: I am the night... I think.

shrouds.title: The Lunatic Chose This Player

lycanthrope.name: Lycanthrope
lycanthrope.ability: Each night*, choose an alive player. If good, they die & the Demon doesn’t kill tonight. One good player registers as evil.
lycanthrope.firstNightReminder: Mark a player with the Registers as Evil reminder.
lycanthrope.otherNightReminder: The Lycanthrope points to a living player: if good, they die. Run the demon's ability as normal. If the Lycanthrope killed, the demon's picks do not die.
lycanthrope.flavor: Beneath the thin veneer of civilisation lies a howling madness.

machinist.name: Machinist
machinist.ability: On your 1st day, you may visit the Storyteller to gain the ability of an off-script character, even if drunk or poisoned.

magician.name: Magician
magician.ability: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.
magician.firstNightReminder: Include the Magician in the Minion and Demon info steps
magician.flavor:
1... 2... Abra... 3... 4... Cadabra... *poof!*
                And, as you can see, ladies and gentlemen, Captain Farnsworth’s bag of gold has disappeared! Gone! Without a trace! Thank you, and goodnight!

jinx.reason: The Magician wakes with Legion and might register as evil. Legion knows if a Magician is in play, but not which player it is.
If the Magician is alive, the Demon doesn't know which neighbor is the Marionette.
When the Spy sees the Grimoire, the Demon and Magician's character tokens are removed.
If the Vizier is in play, the Magician has no ability but is immune to the Vizier's ability.
When the Widow sees the Grimoire, the Demon and Magician's character tokens are removed.
After each execution, the living Magician may publicly guess a living player as the Wraith. If correct, the Demon must choose the Wraith tonight.

marionette.name: Marionette
marionette.ability: You think you are a good character, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbor the Demon]
marionette.firstNightReminder: Select one of the good players next to the Demon and place the Is the Marionette reminder token. Wake the Demon and show them the Marionette.
marionette.flavor: Words, words. They're all we have to go on.

jinx.reason: If the Marionette thinks that they are the Balloonist, an Outsider might have been added during setup.
If the Marionette thinks that they are the Huntsman, the Damsel was added during setup.
If there would be a Marionette in play, they enter play after the Demon & must start as their neighbor.
If there would be a Marionette in play, they enter play after the Demon & must start as their neighbor.
If there would be a Marionette in play, they enter play after the Demon & must start as their neighbor.

mastermind.name: Mastermind
mastermind.ability: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.
mastermind.flavor: The tentacles of that monster are nailed to the doors of the church. Mothers and children are dancing in the street. Excellent. Everything is proceeding exactly as I have planned.

jinx.reason: A Mastermind that has their ability keeps it if the Vigormortis dies.

matchmaker.name: Matchmaker
matchmaker.ability: Each day, privately choose 2 players: you learn if they're connected by an active ability.

mathematician.name: Mathematician
mathematician.ability: Each night, you learn how many players' abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.
mathematician.firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.
mathematician.otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.
mathematician.flavor: Any consistent formal system x, within which a certain amount of elementary arithmetic can be carried out is incomplete; that is, there are statements of the language of x which can neither be proved nor disproved in x. Ergo, you are drunk.

jinx.reason: The Chambermaid can detect if the Mathematician will wake tonight.
The Mathematician might learn if the Drunk's ability yielded false info or failed to work properly.
The Mathematician might learn if the Lunatic attacks a different player than the real Demon attacked.
The Mathematician might learn if the Marionette's ability yielded false info or failed to work properly.

matron.name: Matron
matron.ability: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.
matron.flavor: Miss Featherbottom, be quiet. Master Rutherford, a teacup needs just the four fingers, please. I know you are a father of nine, but age, or lack there-of as the case may be, is never an excuse for poor manners.

mayor.name: Mayor
mayor.ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.
mayor.flavor: We must put our differences aside, and cease this senseless killing. We are all taxpayers after all. Well, most of us.

merchant.name: Merchant
merchant.ability: You & any other alive player may choose to make a deal. Until a new deal is made, if a player breaks the deal, 1 of you will die by next dawn.

messenger.name: Messenger
messenger.ability: On the final night, even if you are dead, choose a player: they learn something. At any time, you may request what.

mezepheles.name: Mezepheles
mezepheles.ability: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.
mezepheles.firstNightReminder: Show the Mezepheles their secret word.
mezepheles.otherNightReminder: Wake the 1st good player that said the Mezepheles' secret word and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil signal.
mezepheles.flavor: That which issues from the heart alone, will bend the hearts of others to your own.

shrouds.title: Your Word Is: "Word"

minstrel.name: Minstrel
minstrel.ability: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.
minstrel.flavor: And I shall hear, tho' soft you tread above me... And all my dreams will warm and sweeter be... If you'll not fail to tell me that you love me... I simply sleep in peace until you come to me.

mole.name: Mole
mole.ability: You are a minion & register as evil. If the Demon publicly guesses you (once), your team loses, even if dead, drunk or poisoned.

moneylender.name: Moneylender
moneylender.ability: Each night, choose an alive player (not yourself): you become their alignment.
moneylender.firstNightReminder: The Moneylender points to a player. If the Moneylender changes alignment show the Moneylender the 'you are' card a thumbs up if they are good and thumbs down if they are evil.
moneylender.otherNightReminder: The Moneylender points to a player. If the Moneylender changes alignment show the Moneylender the 'you are' card a thumbs up if they are good and thumbs down if they are evil.

monk.name: Monk
monk.ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.
monk.otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Monk points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.
monk.flavor: 'Tis an ill and deathly wind that blows tonight. Come, my brother, take shelter in the abbey while the storm rages. By my word, or by my life, you will be safe.

moonchild.name: Moonchild
moonchild.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.
moonchild.otherNightReminder: If the Moonchild used their ability to target a player today: If that player is good, they die.
moonchild.flavor: Scorpio looks sideways at the lovers, and you have a choice to make. With silver cross my palm, and your fate shall be revealed. With steel cross my throat, and by the stars you shall regret it.

mutant.name: Mutant
mutant.ability: If you are "mad" about being an Outsider, you might be executed.
mutant.flavor: I am not a freak! I am a human being! Have mercy!

nanny.name: Nanny
nanny.ability: At night, other players with both hands over their eyes cannot die, but if you die, they might die too.
nanny.firstNightReminder: If the Nanny died, kill any other players with their hands over their eyes.
nanny.otherNightReminder: If the Nanny died, kill any other players with their hands over their eyes.

nightwatchman.name: Nightwatchman
nightwatchman.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn you are the Nightwatchman.
nightwatchman.firstNightReminder: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.
nightwatchman.otherNightReminder: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.
nightwatchman.flavor: The night is cold and lonely, but I have the moon, the stars, the crisp wind and the soft thud of leather boots on cobbled stone for company. Yonder, candlelight flickers behind a murky window...

noble.name: Noble
noble.ability: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.
noble.firstNightReminder: Point to 3 players including one evil player, in no particular order.
noble.flavor: Sarcasm is indeed the lowest form of wit. But speaking in response to your criticism, Sir, it is, nevertheless, a form of wit.

nodashii.name: No Dashii
nodashii.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned.
nodashii.otherNightReminder: The No Dashii points to a player. That player dies.
nodashii.flavor: By the sins of Arnoch, I feel thy laden stench. By the curs-ed sun and her foul legion of tiny grinning gods, I corrupt thee. By the blessed night and the hidden depths of the horrid and unholy sea, I end thy squalid life upon this plane.

nun.name: Nun
nun.ability: Other good players cannot be drunk, poisoned or get false info.

ogre.name: Ogre
ogre.ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.
ogre.firstNightReminder: Wake the Ogre and have them point to a player. If they pointed to an evil player, they become evil. Do not tell them their alignment

ojo.name: Ojo
ojo.ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.
ojo.otherNightReminder: The Ojo player points to a character icon on their character sheet. If that character is in play, that player dies—mark them with the “Dead” reminder. If that character is not in play, choose some number of players. Those players die—mark them with the “Dead” reminder.
ojo.flavor: Like a bonfire on a moonless night... I see you, mortal.

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.ability: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.
oracle.otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of dead evil players.
oracle.flavor: Only the chosen may gaze beyond the veil. The dead are restless, and they point in silence toward the icy north.

organgrinder.name: Organ Grinder
organgrinder.ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Each night, choose if you are drunk until dusk.
organgrinder.firstNightReminder: The Organ Grinder either nods or shakes their head. If they nod: mark them with the 'Drunk' reminder.
organgrinder.otherNightReminder: The Organ Grinder either nods or shakes their head. If they nod: mark them with the 'Drunk' reminder.
organgrinder.flavor: Round and round the handles go. The more you dance the less you know.

shrouds.title: Do You Want Your Ability To Work Today?

orphan.name: Orphan
orphan.ability: If you are good & dead, the Demon only dies by execution if you voted.

pacifist.name: Pacifist
pacifist.ability: Executed good players might not die.
pacifist.flavor: Distrust all in whom the impulse to punish is powerful.

palabradedios.name: Palabra de Dios
palabradedios.ability: Each night*, each alive good player that raised a hand at dusk, kills a random player. If none did, evil wins.
palabradedios.otherNightReminder: Kill a player for everyone that raised their hands.

pall.name: Pall
pall.ability: All players start dead. Dead players may nominate and vote and if executed, are reborn even if you are dead. Each night*, choose a player: they are reborn. If all evils live, evil wins, if you are executed and die, your team loses.
pall.otherNightReminder: The Pall choses a player, they are reborn.

palmreader.name: Palm Reader
palmreader.ability: The Demon attacks one night before it takes effect, even if you are dead. Each night, learn who was attacked.
palmreader.firstNightReminder: If the demon attacked a player, mark the player as 'attacked' point to the marked player or shake you're head 'no' to show no one was attacked.
palmreader.otherNightReminder: Kill the previously marked player if there is one. If the demon attacked a player, mark the player as 'attacked' point to the marked player or shake you're head 'no' to show no one was attacked.

patient.name: Patient
patient.ability: Once per game, at night, you wake: choose an in-play character to gain ability for each night you were asleep.
patient.firstNightReminder: Choose a night for patient to wake up.
patient.otherNightReminder: If this is the night the patient wakes up, the Patient points to a player, they gain their ability for each night they were not waken up.

philosopher.name: Philosopher
philosopher.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.
philosopher.firstNightReminder: The Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.
philosopher.otherNightReminder: If the Philosopher has not used their ability: the Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.
philosopher.flavor: If anything is real, beer is real. Drink, for tomorrow we may die.

phoenix.name: Phoenix
phoenix.ability: On final day, if dead, you are raised as a not-in-play townsfolk. You are sober and healthy.

piper.name: Piper
piper.ability: Once per game, publicly choose that from now on: Minions can privately choose to turn good but the next executee's team loses.

pirate.name: Pirate
pirate.ability: You start knowing how many pirates are in-play. If Pirates are the only good characters alive, good wins. [+0 to +2 Pirates]
pirate.firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of pirates in play.

pithag.name: Pit-Hag
pithag.ability: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not in play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
pithag.otherNightReminder: The Pit-Hag points to a player and a character on the sheet. If this character is not in play, wake that player and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character token. If the character is in play, nothing happens.
pithag.flavor: Round about the cauldron go; In the poison'd entrails throw; Toad, that under cold stone; Days and nights has thirty-one; Sweated venom sleeping got; Boil thou first in the charmed pot.

jinx.reason: If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Cult Leader, they can't turn good due to their own ability.
If a Pit-Hag creates a Damsel, the Storyteller chooses which player it is.
If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Goon, they can't turn good due to their own ability.
If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Ogre, they can't turn good due to their own ability.
If the Pit-Hag turns an evil player into the Politician, they can't turn good due to their own ability.
If there is a spare token, the Pit-Hag can create an extra Village Idiot. If so, the drunk Village Idiot might change.

pixie.name: Pixie
pixie.ability: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.
pixie.firstNightReminder: Show the Pixie 1 in-play Townsfolk character token.
pixie.flavor:
Round and round the garden, go.
				Little girls run to and fro.
				Little boys climb up the tree.
				Which of these should Pixie be?
				Ladies smile and go to town. 
				Lords with axe chop forest down.
				What’s yours is mine. What’s mine, divine.
				Silly little Pixie, me.

shrouds.title: This Role Is In Play
shrouds.epilog: Will you try to steal their name?

plaguedoctor.name: Plague Doctor
plaguedoctor.ability: When you die, the Storyteller gains a Minion ability.
plaguedoctor.flavor: Pleauze shtay shtill. Thinks nid tiime for hillink. Myrhh-myrhh.

jinx.reason: If the Storyteller would gain the Baron ability, up to two players become Outsiders.
If the Storyteller would gain the Boomdandy ability, a player becomes the Boomdandy.
If the Storyteller would gain the Evil Twin ability, a player becomes the Evil Twin.
If the Storyteller would gain the Fearmonger ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.
If the Storyteller would gain the Goblin ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.
If the Storyteller would gain the Marionette ability, one of the Demon's good neighbors becomes the Marionette.
If the Storyteller would gain the Scarlet Woman ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.
If the Storyteller would gain the Spy ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.
If the Storyteller would gain the Wraith ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.

po.name: Po
po.ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.
po.otherNightReminder: If the Po chose no-one the previous night: The Po points to three players. Otherwise: The Po either shows the 'no' head signal , or points to a player. Chosen players die.
po.flavor: Would you like a flower? I'm so lonely.

poisoner.name: Poisoner
poisoner.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
poisoner.firstNightReminder: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
poisoner.otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
poisoner.flavor: Add compound Alpha to compound Beta... NOT TOO MUCH!

politician.name: Politician
politician.ability: If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.
politician.flavor: I'm glad you asked that question. Truly, I am. But I think the REAL question here is...

poppygrower.name: Poppy Grower
poppygrower.ability: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.
poppygrower.firstNightReminder: Do not inform the Demon/Minions who each other are
poppygrower.otherNightReminder: If the Poppy Grower has died, show the Minions/Demon who each other are.
poppygrower.flavor: In the hidden groves of the deep forest, the black poppy dwells. To see its revelry is to be enchanted. To smell its thick aroma is to be lost forever, a slave to the gods of light and dark.

preacher.name: Preacher
preacher.ability: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.
preacher.firstNightReminder: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.
preacher.otherNightReminder: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.
preacher.flavor: It is better to be rich and healthy than poor and sick.

shrouds.title:
You Have No Ability
(Until The Preacher Dies).

prince.name: Prince
prince.ability: After the first night, as long as you haven't been nominated, you cannot die, turn evil, or become another character.

princess.name: Princess
